Articles.Content: YAy! this is new for 0.21 rigth? Im loving it! are you?
there was already a thread on this, but it seems to have disappeared? did it get deleted?
I'm glad they didn't forget to add it this time, we were supposed to get it in 0.20
I believe I saw it in the Junkyard... Got moved due to being released I think.
WAIT THEY INCLUDED IT!? Awesome I didnt notice, suppose its better that I didnt find out in the middle of a burn...:"WAIT AWESOME KILL ALL POWER I NEED TO SEE THIS!!!"
They're on little shelves! Go check it out!

I just realised... in the screenshot they're not wearing helmets. Innnnteresting...

-- Steve

Kerbals don't wear helmets in a lot of the IVAs

There a line in the cfg for creating a IVA on if it should have helmet or not.
I like how junk, refuse, rubbish and waste are separate.
Darn, I forgot to post it myself before someone else did. [/farnsworth voice]
I wonder how do they go to EVA without depressurising the whole module.
It's cool, but I feel like IVA views for the Mk2 and Mk3 cockpits should have been higher priority, as those would actually be functional for flying planes
I love those texts on the boxes... "Science", "More Science", "Toothbrushes", "Board games" (In space?)...

I love those texts on the boxes... "Science", "More Science", "Toothbrushes", "Board games" (In space?)...

Me too, I also like the other side of it where they have 3 or 4 boxes for garbage. Differently named of course. Refuse, trash, rubbish and so on.

As to the board games there are (or were) a variety of travel board games where all the pieces were magnetic so something like that would work quite well in space.

I wonder how do they go to EVA without depressurising the whole module.

The same way they fit their helmets through the door...
